First, the code for the first part:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    int N, A, B;
    scanf("%d %d %d", &N, &A, &B);
    int ans = 0;
    int rep = N / (A + B);
    ans += rep * A;
    int res = N - rep * (A + B);
    ans += (res < A) ? res : A;

    // Now process the second part
    char str[20];
    sprintf(str, "%d", ans);
    int num_g = 0, num_p = 0, score = 0;
    for (int i = 0; str[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        char c = str[i];
        if (c == 'g') {
            if (num_g - num_p > 0) {
                score += 1;
                num_p += 1;
            } else {
                num_g += 1;
            }
        } else if (c == 'p') {
            if (num_g - num_p > 0) {
                num_p += 1;
            } else {
                score -= 1;
                num_g += 1;
            }
        }
        // Ignore other characters
    }
    printf("%d\n", score);
    return 0;
}
